00015         class BasicRxnClass : public ReactionClass {
00016                 public:
00017                         BasicRxnClass(string name, double baseRate, TransformationSet *transformationSet);
00018                         virtual ~BasicRxnClass();
00019 
00020                         virtual void init();
00021                         virtual void prepareForSimulation();
00022                         virtual bool tryToAdd(Molecule *m, unsigned int reactantPos);
00023                         virtual void remove(Molecule *m, unsigned int reactantPos);
00024                         virtual double update_a() {
00025                                         a = 1;
00026 
00027                                         for(unsigned int i=0; i<n_reactants; i++)
00028                                                 a*=reactantLists[i]->size();
00029 
00030                                         a*=baseRate;
00031                                         return a;
00032                         }

00051         inline
00052         bool BasicRxnClass::tryToAdd(Molecule *m, unsigned int reactantPos)
00053                 {
00054                         //First a bit of error checking, that you should skip unless we are debugging...
00055                 //      if(reactantPos<0 || reactantPos>=n_reactants || m==NULL)
00056                 //      {
00057                 //              cout<<"Error adding molecule to reaction!!  Invalid molecule or reactant position given.  Quitting."<<endl;
00058                 //              exit(1);
00059                 //      }
00060 
00061 
00062                         //Get the specified reactantList
00063                         rl = reactantLists[reactantPos];
00064 
00065                         //Check if the molecule is in this list
00066                         int rxnIndex = m->getMoleculeType()->getRxnIndex(this,reactantPos);
00067                         //cout<<"got mappingSetId: " << m->getRxnListMappingId(rxnIndex)<<" size: " <<rl->size()<<endl;
00068 
00069 
00070                         if(m->getRxnListMappingId(rxnIndex)>=0) //If we are in this reaction...
00071                         {
00072                                 if(!reactantTemplates[reactantPos]->compare(m)) {
00073                                 //      cout<<"Removing molecule "<<m->getUniqueID()<<" which was at mappingSet: "<<m->getRxnListMappingId(rxnIndex)<<endl;
00074                                         rl->removeMappingSet(m->getRxnListMappingId(rxnIndex));
00075                                         m->setRxnListMappingId(rxnIndex,Molecule::NOT_IN_RXN);
00076                                 }
00077 
00078                         } else {
00079                                 //Try to map it!
00080                                 ms = rl->pushNextAvailableMappingSet();
00081                                 if(!reactantTemplates[reactantPos]->compare(m,ms)) {
00082                                         rl->popLastMappingSet();
00083                                         //we just pushed, then popped, so we a has not changed...
00084                                 } else {
00085                                         m->setRxnListMappingId(rxnIndex,ms->getId());
00086                                 }
00087                         }
00088 
00089                         return true;
00090                 }
